suppress.notes: The offending library and class and not used in our code https://tools.hmcts.net/jira/browse/RIA-951

Shadowed dependency from AppInsights-Core. Unfortunately, not propagating and applying an override for transitive dependencies. Anyway, this is specific to deserialisation of AtomicDoubleArray and CompoundOrdering classes: https://github.com/google/guava/wiki/CVE-2018-10237
CVE-2018-1115: Vulnerability applies to postgresql before versions 10.4, 9.6.9 is vulnerable. We use Azure 10.5 in Azure which does not have this issue.
CVE-2016-7048: Vulnerability applies to PostgreSQL before 9.3.15, 9.4.x before 9.4.10, and 9.5.x before 9.5.5 only. We use Azure 10.5 in Azure which does not have this issue.
